website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful picture quality and state-of-the-art technology put this 65-inch curved TV ahead of others in its class for a truly remarkable entertainment experience.
pros: Boasts a modern, slim design that does a good job concealing cords
Includes all the features you would expect in a premium curved TV: smart capabilities, 4K, quantum dot technology, HDR, and excellent viewing angles
65-inch screen makes images and colors pop
cons: A few owners complain about problems downloading software updates

website_summaries.verdict: Curved screen provides an immersive viewing experience, and QLED technology makes images come to life. Pricey, but a solid investment in entertainment for those willing to pay the price.
pros: The combination of this smart TV's 4K resolution, quantum dot technology, and curved screen makes an unforgettable viewing experience
Generous 65-inch screen is large enough for spacious areas
cons: Software glitches during update downloads are possible

customer_reviews.title: Great product suffered by worst quality control and bad customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Well where to start. This is one of the products that is absolutley gorgeous but hinders with severe quality control issues. It came out of the box with display fault and when I researched the dark section's on screen is the most common fault of this display panel. But this is not what is the main pain point. The main part is once you start interacting with either samsung or amazon to replace it. I never got it replaced and had to live with using a faulty product. So choose wisely. There are better products out there with quality standards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 65" for my living room and the 55" for my bedroom, Each took about 15 minutes to put together and completely set up. The picture is so awesome that it is like being at a play, everything is extremely realistic, it is like the people are in the room. The morons who rate it low because of shipping problems should be banned from reviewing the tv, they should be reviewing the shipper not the actual tv. The tv automatically connected to my galaxy phone and my galaxy tablets, they all work seamlessly together. I definitely recommend these tv's.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good luck to anybody buy Q7 series
customer_reviews.text: Brand new tv but connect bot can’t piton, call amazon they help me talk to Samsung technical after 45 minutes talk, he say he will send me another new connect box, I will get in 5 business day or less, but it’s 14 days already, today is my last day to return day, so I don’t want wait anymore just return, update Feb 2, finally someone call me saying want fix my tv, I tell them one connect box no good, they even don’t know what’s that, how can they fix my tv, just returned
customer_reviews.author: shyr meau chen

customer_reviews.title: Second Samsung, and still very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: The view and sound quality fo Samsung screens is top rate. We had the predecessor in Hong Kong, and when we moved back to the US we bought the updated curved screen. My only down vote would be that they don't include a swivel mount stand as default. Its a shame to put this on a turntable or replace the stock stand with an hem pivot stand.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED! Inoperational
customer_reviews.text: TV arrived damaged. Will not work now. Was so excited too.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Carlos Garcia Portugal

customer_reviews.title: Overall amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’m passing from a 55” Samsung curved tv from 2016 thinking it was just going to be a little of an upgrade not thinking how much of a difference there is really. Picture quality is amazing specially when you 4K hdr content. Built quality is top notch you don’t see any kind of sacrifices (only thing might be the remote if comparing with Samsung Q9). Sound is really good for it to be from stand alone tv.
customer_reviews.author: Mateo

customer_reviews.title: Used Samsung 4K 55in TV arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This TV arrived with damage to the screen and to the stand. A metal bezel around the screen was bent in several places and the picture had large black bars displaying vertically over the content.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TELEVISION!
customer_reviews.text: The picture is beyond belief. The unit is stylistically impressive
customer_reviews.author: Mike Willett

customer_reviews.title: Beyond dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: To say I was dissapointed would be an understatement ,
customer_reviews.author: Shane noll

customer_reviews.title: Best money could buy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing buy, and for the price?...unbelievable. I am in love with this TV after upgrading from Samsungs MU6 series curved UHD lineup. Upgrading to QLED was a no brainers after seeing it in person, so glad to finally have one of my own. ONLY ONE ISSUE: Not too upset about it but it does kinda bother me to look at it when its staring me in my face clear as day... bottom left hand corner of the TV you can see what I mean.. but other than that I love it and for the price.. I seriously can't complain. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Azzam

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected a vibrant picture really bright colors, but that's not the case this TV is not different than my 4K Samsung UHD. And now it got me thinking ( if the connection box goes bad ) I'm out of a TV. This is a bad investment. Whomever came up with the idea of "one box connect" was thinking, more money for Samsung. Let's see how long it will last. Update..as I feared the connection box got flooded, now I'm out of a TV, and I have to buy a new connection box..$685.00 I knew it was a bad idea. Don't buy a TV with a connection box.
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: WOW !
customer_reviews.text: We previously owned a 55" curved screen and loved it. Bought this and a flush wall mount and all I can say is WOW. Amazing picture, the all in one control box was a simple set up and it works flawlessly. Set-up was easy even for an electronically challenged great grandpa.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: For the most part Samsung has their act together. The one connect box is a great idea saving cable clutter and their easy open carton method works well. This a relatively large box weighs in at 60 lbs, help is a must. I'm reserving opinion on the curved screen, so far haven't felt the added involvement as touted. Have to say the pix clarity is stunning, but I have some concerns. The color adjustment is difficult to use, when you go to settings the picture disappears so you can't immediately see what the change does. MY computer monitor has a much better picture then this TV, doesn't seem right to me. Have to say I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: grill master

customer_reviews.title: 4K 240 megahertz awesome Samsung makes an awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: I've had the TV for 3 months and I'm extremely satisfied it has a external box for multiple connections which has a USB port that will read a flash drive which will enable you to put videos on the flash drive and watch them on your television
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set to replace another Samsung curved tv (not QLED), and am genuinely surprise about the difference in picture quality. The old set was 4K also, but what a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: There is some backlight leak along the top edge, especially visible if you're sitting lower than the TV. It looks like a blue shadow, since QLED backlights are blue. The left and right edges of the screen are darker lit. This is made worse by the fact that the viewing angle is narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Ling

customer_reviews.title: Good only more movies and normal computers game not like this generation
customer_reviews.text: Only 60hz refresh rate My gpu is 144hz Samsung need make more high refresh rate 60hz to 120hz
customer_reviews.author: Jasbir

customer_reviews.title: Not enough life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV in July 2019. It’s COVID19 time, and this TV stopped working three weeks ago. Two tickets, the tech changed the box, another tech came in, the whole panel on the back is bad. Now, almost a month this TV has been out. I wish I could return it. It is Wonderful when it works, but it will NOT be worth to buy without the additional warranty.
customer_reviews.author: DALILA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tv!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second curved Samsung tv and I thought my first one was amazing! This blows it away with both picture quality and ,y favorite part is the airplay2 feature with my phone or iPad straight to the tv! You can’t go wrong especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: awesome picture and features
customer_reviews.text: We have had Samsung models for about 10 years and this is the best ever. The fit and finish is the very best and the one connect feature is awesome. So many quality ideas make this one of our best buys ever. Love Samsung product.
customer_reviews.author: Pops

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for an awesome TV. Arrived in good condition, beautiful picture! My favorite thing about this TV is that the connections are easy to access as they are accessed using a box. No more reaching around the TV trying to connect anything!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Broken when got it
customer_reviews.text: Came in put it together turned it on and just black screen, when I get a new replacement, then I'll make a new review but for right now 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Christina Forzaglia

customer_reviews.title: Ladies and gentlemen save your money from retailers and get this tc
customer_reviews.text: Oh my how to instart. A huuuuuuuuge upgrade for us. The value is amazing for the money. I couldn't recommend it anymore.i looove ittt!!
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new tv from my when my 6 year old tv broke i am very happy with this because of the wounderful picture and great sound for the built in speakers
customer_reviews.author: John A Field Jr

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Picture
customer_reviews.text: I've owned Sony, Sharp Aquos and Samsung TV's. They all have good pictures, but this Samsung 65 in tv has an incredible picture!! Hands down the best of them that I've owned. Great for sports and movies!! The curved just creates a great look for the room!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tv
customer_reviews.text: Terrific tv. Best I have ever had. Works flawlessly especially connecting to Apple TV. Allows you to control Apple TV with Samsung remote so you can have one remote. Only negative is mounting the connect box behind tv if you walk mount, but this isn’t a big deal considering the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Richey

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding TV!
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic TV with color, clarity, contrast, and the brilliance of the display puts my old LG to shame. The price was fantastic. The curved screen provides an amazing picture from many angles. I'll never go back to flat. Easy to set up. Kick back and be prepared to be amazed picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L.

customer_reviews.title: Picture is half black and white
customer_reviews.text: Picture is off, half is good and half is black and white. Supposed to have a tech look at it. Disappointed with it so far. ***Update...TV has been returned for a refund to Amazon.. Not pleased at all with Samsung support during this whole ordeal. Took almost a month of them never giving me a clear direction of what was going on. Finally just sent back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lokii

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: An additional tv to one I already own. The first was so good I ordered another for my man cave
customer_reviews.author: N. B. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Best tv I’ve had!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tv! Picture is on point with darks and vibrant colors. The audio is not bad. Nice equal base to treble for audio enhancement. Bout a sound bar and subwoofer to maximize overall enjoyment. The only thing i dont like is the remote. Needs hotkeys
customer_reviews.author: C-lo

customer_reviews.title: Hi. I accepted TV. This TV was broken.
customer_reviews.text: Hi. I accepted TV. This TV was broken. Please give me reply.
customer_reviews.author: Otgon

customer_reviews.title: The most important thing about this tv is great
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this tv for a shot time so far I impressed with the picture the colors are great I like the one box all in all great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. Had a VIZIO M65 it was ok, this one is GREAT. The color is Amazing. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: John J Dean Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great picture at any angle.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect, setup easy and works great. Exactly what I wanted. Thx.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is that recipient's signature is required and I am working during the day. I have it deliver to my office, then move it to my home. Luckily, my SUV is big enough to load the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Impressive TV
customer_reviews.text: This TV is very impressive for the price - image quality is top-notch. Pros: + Excellent image quality, vibrant brights and deep blacks + Easy set-up and nice device extensibility Cons: - Settings UI isn't very feature-rich
customer_reviews.author: J. Messer

customer_reviews.title: One Connect box functionality is real poor!
customer_reviews.text: The all in one box is so shoddy. I turn the TV on and I can't use the remote control for 20 minutes because the box will not respond. Sometimes I have to unplug and plug the box again. Just to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: steve won

customer_reviews.title: Color, color and more color
customer_reviews.text: Great value tv for a QLED. The black levels are great when watching movies and shows.
customer_reviews.author: Cudi Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Amizing Tv
customer_reviews.text: Very good TV, nice looking and image quality... good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Conceicao Cristo

customer_reviews.title: Great ty
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what he wanted and delivery was completed with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Curved screen???? Whatever.
customer_reviews.text: I like the TV... not convinced that the curved screen is all it was made out to be. Should have gone up to 65” flat screen, which was about same price. Replaced a 5 year old Samsung that I believe had a better picture, but it won’t turn on. It was about $2200 new.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BE SCARED TO PURCHASE CURVED T.V.
customer_reviews.text: WHEN T.V. ARRIVED, BOX IT WAS SHIPPED IN WAS BADLY TORN IN AREAS,I TOOK SEVERAL PICTURES TO PROTECT MYSELF. AFTER OPENING FOUND T.V. TO BE UNHARMED. THE PICTURE ON THIS IS BETTER THAN I IMAGINED, LOVE IT SO FAR.
customer_reviews.author: LT. DAN

customer_reviews.title: Great quality picture and price was extremely good.
customer_reviews.text: Like the quality of the picture of Samsung Q series of televisions.
customer_reviews.author: Goldgranada

customer_reviews.title: Box has been opened and has hole in it!!
customer_reviews.text: Box had been opened and 2 big holes knocked in it but I got it set up and works fine.. So far for the past 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bad boy for $1200 and it's amazing. I believe Samsung has since discontinued this particular model tho.
customer_reviews.author: Guy in his 20s

customer_reviews.title: Common issue
customer_reviews.text: Brand new TV wouldn’t turn on. Had to return it. Apparently this is a common issue with this model.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: New Q7
customer_reviews.text: Came earlier than expected, picture is amazing, not as big as I thought it would be (which is great). So happy with this TV!!
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Foster

customer_reviews.title: Quality is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of this television. The only problem we had was the mounting, but the actual tv has been awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Harris

customer_reviews.title: picture quality!
customer_reviews.text: We are using it in our family room and its picture is perfect for the area. Not too big or too small.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy G

customer_reviews.title: You should have one connect box for 220 volts also.
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the fact that the power of one connect box is only 110 volts.
customer_reviews.author: Nazario Trindade

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: Love the tv easy to set up fast shipping etc. No glitches at all. Very happy and satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: make sure it is compatable with your TV service provider
customer_reviews.text: Like everything as of yet and this TV is used for our personal entertainment
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Also Samsung service has been the worst and I would never go for them again
customer_reviews.text: IT's a decent Television set but definitely not worth the price tag especially due to the fact you can tell the TV was cheaply made.... Also Samsung service has been the worst and I would never go for them again. I bought a soundbar before this Television and had I know the $300 dollar soundbar audio would be worse than the actual TV I would not of bought the soundbar.. Stuck with it with Samsung basically saying "too bad" ah wells..
customer_reviews.author: veg4lyfe

customer_reviews.title: just be Samsung to be great
customer_reviews.text: almost 90% of the devices in my house, are Samsung, go from the mobile, washing machine and dryer until the Television
customer_reviews.author: silton guimaraes

product_meta.title: Samsung 7 Series - Curved 65” QLED 4K UHD Smart TV, 2018
product_meta.description: The beauty of the Q7C arc is a visual spectacle. Equipped with the features of the Q7 Flat, but with a bend for immersive viewing, it combines Q Color and an anti-glare screen for a dazzling display unlike any other. *Mount sold separately. Eco Sensor: Yes.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Samsung 7 Series - Curved 65” QLED 4K UHD Smart TV, 2018 model, One remote TM1850A with batteries and User manual
TV Dimensions: Without Stand – 56.8" W x 32.6" H x 4.1" D. With Stand – 56.8" W x 14.8" H x 36" D. Screen size: 64.5” measured diagonally
Experience dramatic depth with incredibly Deep blacks and an anti-reflective screen
Designed to achieve aesthetic excellence by minimizing wires and mounting flush to the wall as a picture

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars74 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
